resources.string: Enter URL connected to your box here

Your Kinoko is fully grown and ready to go on an adventure outside! 

After you release them you can harvest mushroom and start new game 

Release them?
Do you want to remove this Kinoko?
Put mushroom in and close the box first !
You can take mushroom out of box now
